description: This file defines Pydantic models for API schemas related to agent sessions, runs, and creation within a backend system.

classes.name: AgentSessionCreate
classes.description: Schema for creating an agent session, including session ID and optional agent data.

classes.name: AgentRunCreate
classes.description: Schema for creating an agent run, including session ID, optional team session ID, run ID, run data, and agent data.

classes.name: AgentCreate
classes.description: Schema for creating an agent, including agent ID, optional team ID, app ID, workflow ID, name, and configuration.
